detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract DWGT (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DWGT.sol#84-201) has payable functions:
	 - DWGT.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DWGT.sol#190-192)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0
